newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Trans-Asia sets 10 pct stock dividend.
newsitem.headline: Trans-Asia sets 10 pct stock dividend.

text.p: Trans-Asia Oil and Energy Development Corp said on Wednesday that its board and stockholders had approved a 10 percent stock dividend to be given to shareholders as of January 31.
Corporate secretary Juan Diaz told the Philippine Stock Exchange the dividend will be paid on February 14.
Diaz also said the shareholders approved a plan to change the par value of the shares to one peso each from the present one centavo apiece.
